txt.en: You must find a way to enter the dwarf camp. Perhaps challenging the dwarves to combat will get them to open the gate.
A Gift for the North
Defeat Dourhand trappers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You must find a way to enter the dwarf camp.
Defeat Olwir

'Well done! I got impatient waiting and came to see how you were doing, but it seems you did fine without me. That Stone-troll is slain, and it seems Olwir is as well. He paid a high price for his crime, stealing a cow from Filibert. With him gone, these dwarves shouldn't trouble Rushock Bog much longer.\n\n'You have done well today, my friend. You have my thanks. Are you ready to depart?'
TBD Defeat the stone-troll
You have found Olwir, along with a caged troll!
Defeated Dourhand hunters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Approach the gate
'Who are you? Why are you here?'
'What we are doing is none of your concern.'
The Dourhands have opened the gate to answer your challenge. You should do something that will initiate combat.
Confront Olwir
You have defeated the dwarves guarding the gate. You should proceed into the camp in search of Olwir or a Stone-troll.
You have found Olwir, and he has a caged Stone-troll! You should defeat the Dourhands protecting him.
<rgb=#FF0000>Challenge</rgb> the Dourhands at the gate
You must find a way to enter the dwarf camp.
TBD Tell them you're not leaving
'Leave now [placeholder], if you value your life.'
Uh... ok, defeat the Stone-troll!
It appears that Olwir is no longer a problem, but now you have a bigger one - a Strone-troll that must be defeated.
TBD <rgb=#FF0000>Challenge</rgb> the Dourhands inside the gate
Challenge the Dourhands at the gate
Challenge the Dourhands closer to the gate
Defeat the Stone-troll
You must find a way to enter the dwarf camp.
<rgb=#FF0000>Slap</rgb> the Dourhand tracker
The Dourhands have opened the gate to answer your challenge.
Uh... ok, defeat the Stone-troll!

Search the camp for Olwir

TBD Olwir is defeated!

You have travelled to the outskirts of the dwarf camp in the Rushock Bog. There you hope to put an end to the dwarf Olwir's plan to capture a Stone-troll and give it as a gift to the dwarf Skorgr√≠m in the north.
Wait for the Dourhands
TBD the stone-troll is defeated!
You have found Olwir, and defeated the guards protecting him. He has a caged Stone-troll! You should confront Olwir.
Challenge the Dourhands at the gate
